semsim.reading

Class CASAreader

  • java.lang.Object
    • semsim.reading.AbstractRDFreader
      • semsim.reading.CASAreader

  • public class CASAreader
extends AbstractRDFreader
    Class for working with annotations stored in Combine Archive semantic annotation (CASA) files. CASA files are standalone RDF files stored in Combine (OMEX) Archives that are used to house annotations on the SBML and CellML models stored in the archive.
    Author:
    mneal

      • Fields inherited from class semsim.reading.AbstractRDFreader

    • Constructor Detail

      • CASAreader

        public CASAreader(ModelAccessor ma,
                  SemSimModel semsimmodel,
                  SemSimLibrary lib,
                  java.lang.String rdfstring)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        ma - A ModelAccessor indicating the location of the CASA file
        semsimmodel - The SemSimModel to annotate using the contents of the CASA file
        lib - A SemSimLibrary instance
        rdfstring - Additional RDF content to include in the model's metadata that is not contained in the CASA file (e.g. curatorial info in a CellML model.

        Apply annotations on the physical components of an input SBML model (compartments, species, reactions) using info in the CASA file.
        Parameters:
        sbmlmodel - The SBML model to annotate using the CASA file.
